Enjoy an exclusive 20% off ANY style, no exclusions, when you click here: http://stevemadden.io/aed0x9rTzfY5 

We love a justified purchase.

Kathy Kuo: Thank you for sending me your photo. Thank you for the information. I have already sent your concern to our team. Make sure to check your SMS for updates. I'll be in touch!

Kathy Kuo: No worries. Once I hear a word from our team, I will let you know. Please hang tight!
Kathy Kuo: The pieces you've been eyeing are still on sale, but not for long! Up to 25% off + free shipping ends at midnight: kathykuohome.attn.tv/ao1UjGUJedjM
Is the free shipping off furniture items such as the dressers and sideboard I'm interested in?
Kathy Kuo: The free shipping applies to orders $1500 and above. Just use the code PREZPERK. Let me know if you're having issues applying the code.
For all furniture though?
Kathy Kuo: Yes, as long as your order meets the required minimum purchase of $1500.

escalate: Esc inquiries about items not on the site
ESC if the cx missed a sale & wants to take advantage of it
ESC if the customer is asking for a discount and we don't have one
If cx is looking for general recommendations use LFR shortcut and ESC
templates: If cx is building a new home, interested in refurnishing their entire home or rooms in their home, use the IDS shortcut
If cx is shopping for a client use SFC shortcut
Any convo without a positive outcome (out of stock, not on sale, not shipping in time), use DSS shortcut
dos_and_don_ts: For product-specific delivery time-frame inquiries always check the product page for delivery info and share that with the cx

conversation.message_text:
LANEIGE: Hey Lisa, this is Taylor. Thanks for checking out our site! https://laneige.attn.tv/acsiXtnceweQ .

Did you have questions about this fan fave product? Let me know and I can help answer.

LANEIGE: FREE Lunar New Year gift! Choose your serum with orders $100+. 
SHOP NOW: laneige.attn.tv/aEcLz2g1LM1o .

LANEIGE: Score an exclusive mirror keychain gift with purchase of any 2 JuicePop Box Lip Tints!
SHOP NOW: laneige.attn.tv/a_IZCwn0asZE .

LANEIGE: This Valentine's Day, treat yourself to bonus skincare with orders $60+ and $85+! 
SHOP NOW: laneige.attn.tv/awhknoEyrFI0 .
(attn) Hey, I need help with something: finding the whole line on perfect renew, you only carry 3 items. I need the others

LANEIGE: Yes, I'm afraid those are the only products in the collection at the moment: https://laneige.attn.tv/aKdpiM8hCSwM Let me know if you decide to go for them! I'm here if there's anything else that I can help with.

Where can I buy them? I have the three and love them. But honestly, am I getting the same benefits as others that have the other products to use. These items aren't cheap so why would I keep purchasing something? I can't have the full skin care line in.

LANEIGE: I completely understand your concern. At the moment, we only carry three items from the Perfect Renew collection. Even with just these three, you're still getting the core benefits of the Perfect Renew range - advanced anti-aging care, hydration, and skin vitality. Many customers choose to build their routine around these essentials and see great results.

send_to_cs: Send to CS for any order related inquiries

LANEIGE: FREE Lunar New Year gift! Choose your serum with orders $100+. 
SHOP NOW: laneige.attn.tv/aDSNPPTKIsms .

LANEIGE: Score an exclusive mirror keychain gift with purchase of any 2 JuicePop Box Lip Tints!
SHOP NOW: laneige.attn.tv/a7ygp6SxoOAt .
What is the v fee lunar gift serum sizes

LANEIGE: The Lunar New Year promotion offers a choice of a full-size serum with orders $100+: B&F Serum, Perfect Renew Serum 20ml, or Water Bank Serum. Visit us.laneige.com to take advantage of this offer!
Bouncy and firm and water bank serum are full sizes

LANEIGE: Yes, the Bouncy & Firm Serum and Water Bank Serum are available in full sizes. Check them out here: 
Bouncy & Firm Serum: https://laneige.attn.tv/aHMX2PIzmEyF
Water Bank Serum: https://laneige.attn.tv/aQVL8W-pTajW
Which is better water aqua facial or the exfoliating toner
LANEIGE: Both products are great! The Water Bank Aqua Facial provides deep hydration, while the Exfoliating Toner gently removes dead skin cells. Choose based on your skin's needs.
I thought the water bank aqua also exfoliate though
LANEIGE: The Water Bank Aqua Facial hydrates and revitalizes the skin, while the Exfoliating Toner focuses on removing dead skin cells. Both offer unique benefits for your skincare routine.
Which is great for dry skin
And oily
LANEIGE: For dry skin, the Water Bank Aqua Facial is ideal for hydration. For oily skin, the Exfoliating Toner helps control excess oil and remove dead skin cells.
I wanted to cancel the order since I placed it yesterday.  I also had trouble  messaging you guys about my email I received about expiring points

LANEIGE: My sincere apologies for the inconvenience! I'm afraid I don't see any recent purchases you made on my system. Could you please check if you received a confirmation email or if there's a charge on your account? Sometimes the email might arrive in your spam or promo folder, so be sure to take a look there too!
Order 301161882A

LANEIGE: Thank you for letting me know. For any questions/requests about your order, please contact our customer service team at laneige@apus.amorepacific.com. Due to a high volume of inquiries, our team will get back to you within 72 hours. 

Regarding the email about the your expiring points, can you please share a screenshot of it so I can check?
It was sent way after and I would had used my points on the order.

LANEIGE: I'm sorry for how frustrating this may be, but my system is limited for certain types of requests. The best way to resolve this issue is to contact customer support through the email I shared earlier. They are better equipped to assist you and will take good care of you.
I have sent multiple emails to that email address and no response.
I even messaged on social media.
Template used: "No response from customer support 2"; last updated: 2023-10-16 22:00:00.972

LANEIGE: So sorry for the delay! We are dealing with an influx of support messages, but this does not make your concern any less important. The team is working as hard as possible to address each issue promptly and as soon as I hear back I will message you immediately. I know my apologies won't help in this situation but rest assured, I understand how frustrating this can be and I'm very sorry I can't provide you with an immediate solution. I'm thankful for your patience and understanding and as soon as I get word about this, I will contact you!
